hoatChat: Mỗi 7,5ml chứa: Lysin hydroclorid 150mg; Calci (dưới dạng calci lactat pentahydrat) 65,025mg; Thiamin hydroclorid 1,5mg; Riboflavin natri phosphat 1,725mg; Pyridoxin hydroclorid 3mg; Nicotinamid 9,975mg; Dexpanthenol 5,025mg; Cholecalciferol 200,025 IU; Alphatocopheryl acetat 7,5mg
dongGoi: Hộp 1 chai 30ml; hộp 1 chai 60 ml; hộp 20 ống x 7,5ml
